title: Dana Kellin Butter Mix Half Circle Necklace
description:
A large Labradorite drop anchors the Butter Mix Half Circle pendant, surrounded by sparkling gems of Citrine, Moonstone, Lemon Quartz, and Smoky Quartz. Each stone is secured to the 14/20 GF semicircle by 14k gold wire loops, glimmering with every move. Dana Kellin jewelry is best known for its intricate, meticulous wire-wrapping details. The labor intensive, time consuming nature of the process results in a balance of organic, handmade charm with an air of refinement and sophistication.

  • Dimensions: 33 in
  • Materials: 14/20 goldfill frames, wire, chain and precious gemstones
